definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: I knew she was going to kill me.
sentences.chinese: 我知道就要遭她的毒手了。

sentences.english: He is the sort of man to stab you in the back.
sentences.chinese: 他是那种会在背后给你下毒手的人。

sentences.english: The Chinese were quite heartless in their treatment of Formosan girls.
sentences.chinese: 大陆人对待台湾姑娘是十分心毒手辣的。

sentences.english: At least ten have been killed this month.
sentences.chinese: 至少有十名受害者是在本月遭到毒手的。

sentences.english: Being remorseless, we forgot how cruelly we have treated the animals.
sentences.chinese: 执迷不悔的人们都忘了曾经横施于动物身上的毒手。

sentences.english: Cheng Yin took the orphan by a medicine box to protect the baby.
sentences.chinese: 程婴用药箱将赵氏孤儿带出，使其免遭毒手。

sentences.english: What happened yesterday was that he couldn't deal with the hot potato.
sentences.chinese: 昨天产生的事便是他没能应付这个毒手的人。

sentences.english: Which led the game in his day, was murdered in cold blood killed.
sentences.chinese: 而就在他带队比赛的当天，却惨遭毒手身亡。

sentences.english: Dense months after with fate, died in gelsenkirchen grips.
sentences.chinese: 密月与逆天过招后，死于毒手。

sentences.english: The God of our fathers hath raised up Jesus, whom you put to death, hanging him upon a tree.
sentences.chinese: 我们祖先的天主复活了你们下毒手悬在木架上的耶稣。

sentences.english: But zina unwilling, her sister, let her secretly notice to miserably.
sentences.chinese: 可吉娜不甘心，她暗中通知姐姐，让她去下毒手了。

sentences.english: It is shocking that humans can behave with such bestiality towards others.
sentences.chinese: 令人震惊的是，人竟然能对同类下此毒手。

definition: to kill secretly/to stab in the back
to die tragically/to meet with a violent death
violent death (idiom); to die in a disaster/an unnatural death
to conspire to murder/to plot against sb's life
to meet with disaster/to die tragically
to kill/to cause death/to do sb to death
to hate sb to the bone (idiom)
death cannot wipe out the crimes (idiom); dreadful crimes that rankled even after the perpetrator is dead
